message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"moment; time","sentence":"现在是时候。","image_prompt":"A digital animation depicting a soft apocalypse scene: a surreal, gentle ruin of a city with broken but still standing clocks showing different times, faded sunlight and floating dust. In the center, a modern digital and an old-fashioned analog clock merge, and the atmosphere is calm yet mysterious. The style is otherworldly, soft lighting, slightly muted colors, and hints of overgrown plants reclaiming the scene.","sentence_translation":"Now is the time."}
